data.text:
SonicWall NSA 4700 Firewall TotalSecure - Essential Edition - 1 Year Firewall Additional Information

The SonicWall NSA 4700 Firewall TotalSecure - Essential Edition - 1 Year 02-SSC-9570 firewall is one of the best mid-range firewalls that offers superior performance with a simple management interface. The SonicWall NSA 4700 Firewall TotalSecure - Essential Edition - 1 Year is rated for 1000-2500 users, 5.5 Gbps firewall throughput, and 2.2 Gbps VPN throughput. Trust that your network security environment is protected with any of the SonicWall licenses that include Total Secure Essentials, Total Secure Advanced Secure Upgrade Plus Essentials, or Secure Upgrade Plus Advanced enhanced security features.

Available Advanced Network Threat Technology For The SonicWall NSA 4700 Firewall TotalSecure - Essential Edition - 1 Year

At the core of the SonicWall NSA 4700 Firewall TotalSecure - Essential Edition - 1 Year is the SonicOS 7.0 operating system. This updated operating system includes updates to the user interface, management capabilities, and integrated SD-WAN.

The SonicWall NSA 4700 Firewall 02-SSC-9570 combats threats with the cloud based SonicWall Capture Advanced Threat Protection (ATP). This multiengine sandboxing tool allows for analysis of threats known and unknown to your network, taking advantage of the hive experiences of SonicWall users.

Combine the ATP with SonicWall's patent pending Real-Time Deep Memory Inspection (RTDMI) and you get an optimized digital environment protected by the SonicWall NSA 4700 Firewall TotalSecure - Essential Edition - 1 Year

Managed Firewall Services For The SonicWall NSA 4700 Firewall TotalSecure - Essential Edition - 1 Year 02-SSC-9570 By Firewalls.com

Often end users deploy firewalls that aren't configured correctly which results in unnecessary vulnerabilities. Lean on the SonicWall certified expert engineers at Firewalls.com pre-configure or remotely configure your SonicWall NSA 4700 Firewall TotalSecure - Essential Edition - 1 Year firewall. This will ensure that you are getting the most out of your purchase and minimizing unwanted threats.
